explains: adj. 肮脏的；卑鄙的；利欲熏心的；色彩暗淡的

sentences.en: I want no part of this sordid business.
sentences.cn: 我决不卷入这一卑鄙勾当。

sentences.en: It was a shock to discover the truth about his sordid past.
sentences.cn: 他以往的丑行被发现时，人们感到震惊。

sentences.en: I didn't want to hear the sordid details of their relationship.
sentences.cn: 我不想听他们之间的那些龌龊细节。
